trans-unit.source: Configuring your Web Server can be as complex or as simple as you want it to be.

trans-unit.source: In this instance, the technical writer knows nothing about his subject.

trans-unit.source: Make sure all of the right buttons are checked, or else you will never get it to work

trans-unit.source: Go to your site library and check out a book; any book, even about COBOL, is likely to be more helpful than I am.
